body: I agree, but the original was using a function which was in essence inserting a switch call with //tensorflow:with_cuda_support_windows_override, I didn't want to change the logic since I don't know whether `//tensorflow:with_cuda_support_windows_override==//tensorflow:windows` or has some extra requirements. If you want I can change it to `//tensorflow:windows`. Please let me know what you prefer.

If you want I can change it to //tensorflow:windows. Please let me know what you prefer.
